mapper.insert: insert into GSP_YPFJCLTZD_HZ (DANJ_NO, RIQI_DATE, YANGH_STAFF, FUJ_STAFF, ZHIJ_STAFF, CAOZ_STAFF, HOUSE_ID,YANGH_STAFF_ID, ZHIJ_STAFF_ID,CAOZ_STAFF_ID) values (#{DANJ_NO}, to_date(#{RIQI_DATE},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{YANGH_STAFF}, '', #{ZHIJ_STAFF}, #{CAOZ_STAFF}, #{HOUSE_ID}, #{YANGH_STAFF_ID}, #{ZHIJ_STAFF_ID}, #{CAOZ_STAFF_ID})

insert into GSP_YPFJCLTZD_MX (DANJ_NO, DANJ_SORT, SHANGP_ID, LOT, XIANS_LOC, NUM, ZHIL_QUESTION, FUJ_RESULT, CHUL_OPIN, YIZ_ADDRESS, DANW_ID, CAIGOU_STAFF, SHENH_FLG, SF_SC, YEZ_NAME, YEZ_ID, TS_DANJ_NO, TS_HANGHAO, HUOW_ID) values (#{DANJ_NO}, #{DANJ_SORT}, #{item_id}, #{lot_id}, #{loc_code}, #{NUM}, #{ZHIL_QUESTION}, '', '', '', #{customer_id}, #{CAIGOU_STAFF}, '0', '0', #{owner_name}, #{owner_id}, #{TS_DANJ_NO}, #{TS_HANGHAO}, #{loc_id})
